Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusDescription" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusDescription" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RefCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="LineNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Provider registration completed with context %1 and status %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Object" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Provider deregistration completed with context %1 and status %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Object" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Provider rundown completed with context %1 and status %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Object" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Update sample completed for context %1, provider %2, value %6, value type %7 with status %9
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ContextHandle" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Provider" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ServiceNlmEpoch" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ServiceNlmSignature" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ClientNlmEpoch" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ValueType" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="ScheduleUpdate" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Network change occured, new value = %7, new value type = %8
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NlmEpochBefore" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NlmSignatureBefore" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="NlmSignatureStableBefore" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="NlmEpochAfter" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NlmSignatureAfter" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="NlmSignatureStableAfter" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ValueType" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="ScheduleUpdate" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: Collecting provider %1 with request holder %2 for notification
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Provider" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="RequestHolder" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message: Accepting update request for provider %1 finished with status %6
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ContextHandle" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Provider" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="RequestHolder" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="UpdateRequested" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="CompleteCall" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Completing update request for provider %1 finished with status %6
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Provider" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="RequestHolder" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Value" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ValueType" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="NlmEpoch" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Provider" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="RefCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="LineNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Provider %1 referenced, the previous refcount was %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Provider" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="RefCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="LineNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Provider %1 dereferenced, the previous refcount was %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Provider" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="RefCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="LineNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1 updated timer values - app input value %2 current timeout value %3 stored timeout value %4 wns test timeout value %5
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Description" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="App provided time" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Current keepalive time" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Lowered keepalive time" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="WNS test input time" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
